pages.title: Plains Bison
pages.text: The American bison ($(o)Bison bison$()) is a species of bison native to North America.$(br2)Sometimes colloquially referred to as buffalo ($(o)a distinct clade of bovine$()), it is one of two extant species of bison, alongside the European bison.

pages.title: Plains Bison
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Active during Daytime$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:flora_junegrass$(br2)Number of Offspring: 1$(br2)Growth time: 10 Days
